Benito de 39 años, tiene un puesto en el mercado donde vende platanos. Vive con su esposa y 4 hijos de 16, 8, 6 y 5 años en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores. 

El trabajaba con un  amigo vendiendo platanos pero como quería independizarse y ganar su propio dinero decidió invertir sus ahorros en platanos, ramas de platanos para vender en el mercado. En la actualidad tiene su puesto en el mercado en donde ramas de platano a $ 3.75 (vienen unos 30 platanos) tiene platanos de distinto precio según como sea el tamaño de la rama hasta $ 6.50.  

Con el préstamo quiere comprar en un volumen mayor ramas de platanos para poder vender a mas clientes. En el futuro quiere tener su propio local en la parte delantera de su casa para pasar mas tiempo con su familia,
texts.en:
Benito is 39 years old.   He has a stall in the market where he sells bananas.  He lives with his wife and 4 children aged 16, 8, 6 and 5 in an urban area called Orquídeas (orchids).  The area is so called because when it was discovered they found many flowers there and currently there is a park of orchids there.

Benito used to work with a friend selling bananas but as he wanted to become independent and earn his own money he decided to invest his savings in bunches of bananas to sell in the market.  He currently has a market stall where he sells large bunches of bananas for $3.75 (for 30 bananas).  He sells bananas for different prices according to how big the bunch is, up to a price of $6.50.

He would like to use his loan to buy more bunches of bananas so that he can sell to more customers.  In the future he would like to have his own premises in the front part of his home so that he can spend more time with his family.

loans.use: To buy bananas

loans.name: Leonarda Migdalia

texts.es: Leonarda Migdalia tiene 40 años su actividad es la venta de mercadería en general. Hace más de 5 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy beneficioso para su familia tiene 4 hijos menores de edad, ella ha sido muy responsable ya que ha demostrado  mantener este negocio activo. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de calzado, ropa en general, cosméticos y otras cosas. Sueña con mejorar su negocio y al mismo tiempo quiere mejorar las ganancias para aumentar su inventario.
texts.en: Leonarda Migdalia is 40 years old.  Her business activity is selling general merchandise.  She has had her business for more than 5 years and it has been very beneficial for her family.  She has 4 dependent children.  Leonarda has been very responsible since she has shown herself able to keep her business active.  She will use her loan to buy footwear, clothes, cosmetics and other items.  She dreams of improving her business and, at the same time, she would like to improve her profits so that she can increase her inventory.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Fataye

texts.fr: Madame Ndeye Anta Diop est une femme restauratrice qui vie à Mbour avec une gargotte qui lui serve de restaurant.Elle a une ancienneté de 10 ans dans ce secteur alimentaire. Egalement elle prépare de jus de fruits naturels et vend de la glace.ainsi, elle sollicite ce crédit pour acquisition d'intrants destinés à la fabrication de jus.ceci va lui permettre d'accroitre son commerce et d'obtenir plus gain et aider son mari dans la gestion de sa famille
texts.en: Mrs. Ndeye Anta Diop lives in Mbour and cooks food for sale in her modest eatery. She has 10 years of experience in this business. She also prepares natural fruit juices and sells ice. She is seeking this loan in order to purchase ingredients necessary for preparing juices. This will allow her to grow her business, obtaining more income and helping her husband provide for the family.

loans.use: Cooking food for sale

loans.name: Celia Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Celia del Socorro V. V., tiene la edad de 37 años, es casada y su esposo labora como Guarda de Seguridad, apoyándole a su familia con los gastos económicos  en que estos incurren , ellos tienen 3 hijos, y dos de ellos son mayores de edad que estudian la universidad y el menor  la secundaria, los padres de familia son agricultores, desde hace mas de 12 años, en donde han tenido problemas de sequia e infección de plagas, fue con el apoyo de su esposo que compro un pequeño terrero en el cual ahora están localizadas las siembras, es para su negocio que solicita un préstamo para un mantenimiento Fitosanitario optimo que favorezca la producción, aumente las ventas de las cosechas y mejore continuamente la economía de la familia, con el crédito compraran fertilizantes, fungicidas, e insumos vegetativos que a futuro permitirán la incursión a nuevos mercados de vegetales que se consuman en masa. Esta inversión les admitirá suplir con el gasto económico que incurre la familia con sus hijos mayores en la Universidad.
texts.en:
Celia del Socorro V. V. is 37 years old, married, and her husband works as a security guard helping his family with the financial expenses that they incur. They have three children – two are adults and are university students and the youngest is in high school. The parents have been farmers for more than 12 years and have had problems with drought and pests. It was with the help of her husband that she bought a small piece of land where the crops are now located.

She is requesting a loan for her business to provide good plant health care that favors production, increases crop sales and continually improves the family finances. With the loan, they will purchase fertilizers, fungicides and plant supplies that will allow them to enter new vegetable markets in the future where the crops are widely consumed.

loans.use: Plant health care

loans.name: Maria De Fatima

texts.es:
María de 53 años, tiene una pequeña papelería. Vive en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores. 

Cuando la liquidaron en una empresa que ella estaba atrabajando decidió ya no ser parte del grupo de trabajadores que dependen de los empleadores por eso decidió tener su propio negocio para tener sus propias ganancias. Compro papelería y ubico su negocio en la parte delantera de su casa. En la actualidad el tiene su papelería con unas rejas muy gruesas para tener más seguridad debido a la delincuencia del sector. En ocasiones la ayuda su hermana ya que el único hijo que tiene migro al extranjero. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar papelería, cuadernos para surtir más su negocio. En el futuro quiere terminar de construir su casa y hacer más grande su negocio.
texts.en:
María is 53 years old.  She has a small stationery store.  She lives in an urban area called Orquídeas (orchids).  The area is so called because when it was discovered they found many flowers there and currently there is a park of orchids.

When she was made redundant from a company where she was working, she decided that she no longer wanted to be part of the group of workers who depend on their employers.  For this reason, she decided to set up her own business so that she could make her own profits.  She bought stationery items and set up her business in the front part of her home.  She currently has thick bars at the windows of her stationery store for security reasons as there is a lot of crime in the area.  Her sister sometimes helps her in the store as her only son migrated abroad.

María would like to use this loan to buy stationery and exercise books to better stock her business.  In the future, she would like to finish building her house and extend her business.

loans.use: To buy stationery and exercise books

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: El señor Jorge Luis T. L., tiene la edad de 41 años es casado y su esposa es secretaria de una empresa privada, ellos tienen un hijo de 9 años, el cual estudia la primaria, ellos son agricultores desde hace mas de 10 años, en los cuales se ha enfrentado a problemas de plagas y sequia, que han disminuido las cosechas, ocasionándoles problemas económicos que afectan a toda la familia, es para sus terrenos que solicitan un préstamo para un mantenimiento fitosanitario que favorezca los terrenos, con el préstamo compraran fertilizantes, fungicidas, e insumos vegetativos, que ha futuro admitan la diversificación de sus siembras y/o la obtención de un terreno para la ampliación de sus plantaciones, que mejoren continuamente las condiciones socio-económicas en las que actualmente habitan.
texts.en:
Jorge Luis T. L. is 41 years old and married. His wife works as a secretary at a private business and they have a 9-year-old son in elementary school. They have been farmers for more than 10 years, during which time they have faced pest and drought problems that have diminished their crops, causing financial problems that affect the entire family.

They are requesting a loan for their farmlands to provide plant health care that helps the crops. With the loan, they will purchase fertilizers, fungicides and plant supplies which will allow for the future diversification of their crops and/or obtaining a piece of land to expand their croplands, which will continuously improve their socio-economic conditions.

loans.use: Plant health care

loans.name: Ouleye

texts.fr: Mademoiselle Ouleye S. est une jeune fille qui travaille dans la production vente de jus de fruits naturels quelle confectionne.Son refrigérateur était tombé en panne raison pour la Mademoiselle S. a sollicité ce crédit pour l'acquisition d'un nouveau.Ainsi, elle pourra redonner vie à son activité et les bénéfices tirés de ce commerce vont lui servir d'aide à sa famille
texts.en: Miss Ouleye S. is a young woman who makes and sells natural fruit juices. Her fridge broke down, so Miss S. needs a loan to buy a new one. This way, she will be able to revive her business and all the profits will be used to help her family.

loans.use: Purchase a refrigerator

loans.name: Chancelyannick

texts.fr:
Il avait crée les nouveaux créneaux pour accroitre son activité et cela avait bien marché, il a augmenté son chiffre d’affaire dans sa vente des vêtements de prêt à portés de deuxième catégories.
Le présent prêt  va encore lui donné un élan pour aller de l’avant.
Il va   commander auprès de ses fournisseurs de Kinshasa et de Pointe-Noire comme il la toujours fait pour  accroitre son commerce.
De 30000f à 60000f jour maintenant il a des revenus de 3000000f  quand il renouvelle son   stock. Avec le prêt actuel, il va augmenter sa marchandise en misant sur les articles de couleurs qui attire les jeunes tels que pantalon toile, jean de marques chemise manches longues et courtes, tee-shirt à la mode polo genre la Coste, tenue de sport, veste de sport.
Célibataire de son état , il ne pense pas encore au mariage, mais il s’occupe de ses frère et sœurs en les encadrant afin qu’il réussissent à leurs études. Il compte ouvrir une boutique d’habillement  ses économies devient plus importantes.
texts.en:
He created a new niche to make his business grow and it worked well. His business turnover for the sales of ready-to-wear clothes has increased. 

This loan will help him go even further. He will order from his suppliers in Kinshasa and Pointe-Noire, as he always has, to develop his business. From 30,000f to 60,000f a day, his income is 3,000,000f when he renews his stock. With this loan, he will increase his merchandise while focusing on colorful items that attract young people, such as canvas pants, branded jeans, short-sleeve and long-sleeve shirts, polo t-shirts (Lacoste-like), sportswear, and sports jackets. 

Currently single, he is not thinking about marriage yet, but he is looking after his siblings to make sure they have a successful education. When he has enough money saved up, he plans on opening a clothing store.

loans.use: Buying short-sleeve and long-sleeve shirts, jeans, polo t-shirts, canvas pants

loans.name: Omar De La Concepción

texts.es: El señor Omar de la Concepción R. L., es un hombre adulto que habita con su pareja de vida y sus tres hijos  menores de edad, los cuales se dedican a los estudios primarios, el señor Omar labora como Guarda de seguridad, ellos habitan en un humilde casa, la cual con este año con las lluvias de invierno, daño significativamente el techo de su vivienda, ha sido con el esfuerzo de él y el de su esposa que han logrado edificar su hogar, y es por esta misma causa que solicitan un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción para el cambio del tejado, esta inversión les permitirá mejor seguridad y condiciones socio económicas para sus tres hijos, sobre todo porque los ingresos que a familia tiene mensualmente cubre solo lo gastos necesarios, ellos esperan que con este préstamo mejoren sus vidas significativamente.
texts.en: Omar de la Concepción R. L. is an adult man who lives with his life partner and three young children who are in elementary school.  Omar works as a security guard and they live in a modest home.  However, the winter rains this year significantly damaged the roof of their house.  They have been able to build the house with the effort of both Omar and his wife, and it is for this same cause that they are requesting a loan to purchase construction materials to change the roof.  This investment will provide them with better security and socio-economic conditions for their three children.  Their monthly family income covers only the necessary expenses, so they hope that this loan will significantly improve their lives.

loans.use: To change the roof of their house

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es:
Francisco de 34 años, tiene una tienda de víveres. Vive con su esposa y dos hijos en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores. 

Empezó a trabajar en una panadería pero como quería general sus propios ingresos y darle una mejor vida económica a su familia decidió invertir sus ahorros y comprar víveres para tener una tienda.  En la actualidad trabaja con su esposa desde las 06h30am atendiendo la tienda. En su tienda vende arroz, aceites, enlatados etc. También hace panes pero a un bajo volumen. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar víveres como  enlatados, bebidas, harina para tener más variedad en sus productos. En el futuro quiere agrandar su tienda para tener mas ingresos y mejorar la vida económica de su familia.
texts.en:
34-year old Francisco runs a grocery store. He lives with his wife and two children in an urban neighbourhood called Orquídeas (Orchids) because when the area was discovered, many flowers were found there. Today there is a park containing orchids.

Francisco started out working in a bakery, but as he wanted to make money on his own and provide a better financial future for his family, he decided to spend his savings buying supplies and open a shop. Nowadays he and his wife start work in the store at 6:30 am. He sells rice, oil, canned goods etc. He also makes bread but not in any great quantity.

With the loan he wishes to buy supplies such as canned goods, drinks, and flour to add more variety to his stock. In the future Francisco would like to expand the store so he can earn more money and improve the family’s financial situation.

loans.use: to buy flour and drinks

loans.name: Sumeera

texts.en:
Sumeera lives in Lahore, which is the second largest city in Pakistan and famous for its gardens and historic places. People from all over the world visit this beautiful city every year. 

She is a young lady married to L. H., who runs a small restaurant near his home. He offers different kinds of Punjabi food, such as biryani (made with chicken and rice) and Nan chanay (made with chickpeas and served with bread and pickles) and tea. He has been in this business for many years and has built a good reputation among his clients due to the quality food and customer service.
  
Sumeera helps her husband prepare food for his restaurant. She also fulfills her responsibilities of a housewife very well.  

Sumeera has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner, Asasah, for her husband's restaurant business. With the loan, her husband will buy cooking oil, rice, chickpeas and spices, etc., in bulk. 

Sumeera is hopeful that with the loan, her husband’s business will grow and his income will increase.

loans.use: To buy needed supplies for the restaurant business.

loans.name: Mayerlin

texts.es:
Mayerlin C. es una mujer muy jovial que vive en el Municipio de Malambo área metropolitana De la ciudad de Barranquilla; ella se dedica a la venta de cuadernos, resmas de papel, accesorios femeninos y juveniles y todo lo relacionado con la papelería, en una miscelánea que tiene en su propia casa, donde vive con su cónyuge y sus 3 hijos en las edades de 11 a 18 años. 
Su credikiva lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para responder al mes de Diciembre,  que se viene con muchos pedidos de esta  mercancía, pero también comprará  útiles escolares, preparándose para el mes de Enero, temporada en la cual regresan los estudiantes a los colegios y repuntan las ventas de estos materiales. 
La historia de su negocio llamado Shaday que significa “Dios todo poderoso, el todo suficiente” y que inició con el propósito de apoyar a su esposo en la gestión del hogar, que trabaja como vigilante de una empresa y siempre es su gran apoyo, porque es quien después de  su jornada laboral,  hace las compras, pues conoce muy bien como se mueven los proveedores en el mercado,  y las mercancías apropiadas, de acuerdo con las especificaciones que Mayerlin le entrega, respondiendo a lo que sus clientes han solicitado.  
Mayerlin cuenta que su negocio ha contribuido con el mejoramiento de su autonomía, reforzado por los créditos, que le han significado mayor liquidez para irse a comprar de contado y aumento de sus ingresos para beneficiar su hogar. Su credikiva es el sexto financiamiento por parte de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la que ha crecido personal y empresarialmente y con la que planea ir de la mano, para lograr su sueño de ampliarlo significativamente hasta lograr el reconocimiento y el posicionamiento no solo de su comunidad sino también de todo el municipio y de sus alrededores.
texts.en:
Mayerlin C. is a cheerful woman who lives in the municipality of Malambo, in the metropolitan area of Barranquilla. She earns her living by selling notebooks, paper, accessories for woman and girls, and anything else connected with the stationery business which she runs from a small store in her house. She and her husband have three children between the ages of 11 and 18 years.

Mayerlin plans to use her Kiva credit to buy clothing as December brings with it many orders for items of clothing. She also wants to buy school supplies in preparation for January when students return to school and sales of this kind pick up.

Her business is called Shaday which mean “All-powerful God”. She started it in order to help her husband with household costs. He works as a security guard for a company and is a great help to Mayerlin. After his day’s work, he buys stock for her store as he knows where the best deals are in the market and the best items to buy according to the instructions Mayerlin has given him which, in turn, depend on what her customers are looking for.

She notes that her business has helped her become more independent. The loans have given her more liquidity to buy on account and increase her income, thus benefitting the household. 

This is her sixth loan with Kiva partner, the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, an organisation which has helped both her and her business grow. She plans to continue working with them so she can fulfill her dream of becoming a well-respected person not only in her community but also within the municipality and surrounding areas.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothing and school supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase second hand clothes to sell

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es: Raquel, D. 48 años, está casada con Guillermo, D. 52 años, ambos tienen 6 hijos, pero solo viven con 3 D. ellos en su casa propia ubicada, en la localidad D. Kivinaki (selva central peruana). El trabajo que desempeña, Raquel. Es la agricultura, hace ya 20 años que se dedica a la siembra D. plátano, maíz y cítricos. Con la ayuda D. su esposo e hijos; todos los días se dedica al cuidado D. sus cultivos. Lo que más le gusta, es ver cristalizado sus esfuerzos, ya que en cada cosecha, comercializa, sus productos a buen precio. Con las temporadas agrícolas, y la ayuda D. su banco comunal, Raquel, está juntando un poco D. dinero, con lo que quiere abrir un negocio D. compra y venta D. frutas al por mayor. Pero paralelamente, seguir cultivando más productos oriundos D. la zona. Es el sexto crédito con MFP y, como integrante más antigua D. su banco comunal, está satisfecha del trabajo alcanzado hasta hoy. Con el crédito que obtendrá, podrá comprar plantas, para renovar sus plantaciones D. cítricos D. esa manera poder tener frutos, más grandes y jugosos.
texts.en:
48-year old Raquel is married to 52-year old Guillermo. They have six children, but only three still live with them in their own house located in the community of Kivinaki (in the central rainforest of Peru). Raquel has worked as a farmer for 20 years, growing bananas, corn, and citrus fruits. With help from her husband and children, she works in the fields every day. The part she enjoys the most is seeing the results of the effort she puts in; with each harvest she sells her produce for a good price. 

From these harvests and with help from her community bank, Raquel is putting together a bit of money with which she wants to open a wholesale business buying and selling fruit. At the same time she wants to continue growing more produce native to the area. 

This is Raquel’s sixth loan with Kiva partner MFP. As the longest-standing member of her community bank, she is satisfied with what she has achieved to date. With the loan she plans to buy new citrus plants for her fields so she can produce bigger, more juicy fruit.

loans.use: to buy citrus fruit plants

loans.name: Mario

texts.en: Mario is a 46-year-old married man with three children living in Kasese, Uganda. Mario lives in his own family house. He is into selling milk and has been a milk vendor and a poultry farmer for 11 years. However, his hardship is a scarcity of milk during the dry season. His future plans are to complete his second house and educate his children up to the University level. Mario intends to use the loan funds to buy Friesian cows for milk production for selling.

loans.use: To buy Friesian cows to produce milk to sell

loans.name: Melver

texts.es: Melver, de 19 años, es un joven con muchas ambiciones, vive en la capital del país, ahí estudia para poder ser aceptado en una universidad. Pero los fines de semana visita a sus padres, que residen en la zona rural de Tapo (sierra del Perú). A su corta edad él apoya a sus padres e invierte en su futuro. Hace algunos años, sus padres le dieron la confianza de poder sembrar en los terrenos que le dieron de herencia, desde entonces  siembra papa, en grandes cantidades, con la ayuda de peones y la asesoría de su padre, logrando así generarse un pequeño capital. Pero como sus aspiraciones son estudiar Ingeniería Agroindustrial, en la capital, decidió, comenzar a estudiar para poder ser aceptado en una universidad, pero sin descuidar de su cultivo, ahora él, no solo los comercializa en el mercado central de su ciudad, sino también en el mercado de abastos de la capital, donde descubrió que, puede adquirir mayores ganancias. Ahora Melver, está dedicado íntegramente a cumplir su objetivo y retribuir el apoyo que le ofreció su familia. Es el tercer crédito con MFP y agradece el apoyo que le ofrece su banco comunal, en estos momentos de superación y construcción de objetivos. Con el crédito que obtendrá, podrá comprar abono para su producción de papa, que dentro de algunos meses cosechará.
texts.en:
Melver, at 19 years of age, is a young man with many ambitions.  He lives in the capital of the country where he studied to be accepted in the university.  But on weekends, he visits his parents who reside in the rural zone of Tapo (in Peru's mountains).  At his young age he helps his parents and invests in his future.

Some years ago, his parents instilled in him the confidence to be able to cultivate lands he received as an inheritance.  Since then, he has sown potatoes in large quantities, with the help of day laborers and the advice of his father, thus acquiring a small amount of capital.

But since Melver's aspirations are to study agro-industrial engineering in the capital, he decided to study hard in order to be accepted in the university, while not neglecting his farm.  Now, he not only sells in the local central market, but also in the main market of the capital, where he discovered that he could obtain larger earnings.  Now Melver is entirely dedicated to reaching his objectives and paying back the assistance offered by his family. 

This is his 3rd loan with MFP and he appreciates the help of his communal bank in these moments of achieving and constructing his objectives.  With the loan Melver will obtain, he can buy manure to increase production of the potatoes that he will harvest within a few months.

loans.use: TO BUY SACKS OF MANURE TO IMPROVE HIS POTATO PRODUCTION

loans.name: Edward

texts.en: Edward is a Ugandan male who is 24 years old and married with one child. He owns a house and is a vanilla and coffee farmer. Edward also operates a retail shop of general merchandise. He has been in the business for three years. He started with an initial capital of 350,000/= but has managed to grow to 2,800,000/=.  The only challenge he has is lack of transport, however he has a plan to expand his business into a wholesale business. Edward intends to use the loan proceeds to purchase sugar, salt, cooking oil, and soap to sell.

loans.use: To purchase sugar, salt, cooking oil, and soap to sell

loans.name: Julien Destin

texts.fr:
Il vend les tissus depuis 4 ans qu’il allait acheter à Kinshasa, le prêt passé lui a montrer une autre façon de gérer son activité.

Les ventes ont augmenté de 25000f  à 80000f jour, l’enseignement reçu lui a permis  d’améliorer   la qualité des services comme la tenue d’un journal de caisse, faire l’inventaire , la fiche de gestion de stock et comment calculer les bénéfices.

 Le prochain prêt  viendra encore pour lui donner plus d’avantages afin de réaliser ses rêves.
Il va acheter plus des tissus pour les enfants  (filles et garçon), pour faire les meilleures ventes pendant la fête des enfants  après cela il va continuer à acheter d’autres tissus tels que : soie, jeans, velours,  super 100, satin et  les  tissus actuelle.
Pour atteindre son objectif , il se fixe un but celui de vendre les tissus de qualités pour augmenter son chiffre d’affaire.

Sa vie familiale a beaucoup changée, il devient  plus responsable et s’occupe bien de  la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Julien Destin B. has sold cloth for 4 years that he bought in Kinshasa. His previous loan showed him a new way to run his business. 
Sales increased from 25 000F to 80 000F per day. The training he received gave him the opportunity to improve the quality of services like keeping a cash book, doing an inventory,  keeping a store ledger card and how to measure profits. 

He sees the next loan as another opportunity to make his dreams come true. 
He will buy more cloth for children (girls and boys) in order to realize the best sales during the children's day celebration. Then, he will keep buying different kind of cloth like silk, denim, corduroy, super 100 wool, satin stitch and other current cloth. 
To reach his goal, he wants to sell good quality cloth to increase sales. 
His family life has changed a lot; he is more and more responsible and takes good care of his children's schooling.

loans.use: To buy good quality cloth, suit cuts, super 100 and 200 wool, satin stitch

loans.name: Doryz Nelly

texts.es:
Dorys de 45 años, vende meriendas en la noche. Vive con su esposo en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores. 

Empezó con su negocio de venta de comida porque quería tener sus propios ingresos para no depender de alguien. En la actualidad vende meriendas en las noches con ayuda de su esposo. Vende arroz con meriendas y pollos, carnes incluidos con jugos o colas a un valor muy bajo. Vende la comida afuera de su casa por eso quiere readecuar su casa para tener más espacio y que sus clientes se sientan cómodos. 

Con el préstamo quiere comprar cemento, pinturas para readecuar su casa. En el futuro quiere continuar con su negocio y poder tener la oportunidad de salir de la pobreza.
texts.en:
Dorys, age 45, sells snacks at night.  She lives with her husband in an urban zone called Orquídeas.  The zone got its name because of the many flowers that were there when it was discovered.  Now there is a park with these flowers.

She started her business of selling food because she wanted to have her own income so that she would not depend on someone else.  She currently sells snacks at night with help from her husband.  She sells rice with snacks and chicken, meat, juice, or soft drinks at a very low price.  She sells the food outside of her house, and that is why she wants to refurbish her house.  She wants to have more space so that her customers will be more comfortable.

She wants to use the loan to buy cement and paint to refurbish her house.  In the future she wants to continue with her business.  She also wants to be able to have the opportunity get out of poverty.

loans.use: Cement and paint

loans.name: Ahmed

texts.en:
Ahmed is a thirty-seven-year-old married man. He has seven children and lives in a family house in Kasese, Uganda. He has had a retail shop for ten years that he started with 500,000 Uganda shillings of capital but increased to capital of 4,500,000 Uganda shillings. However, his hardships include low demand as a result of a sparsely populated area and increased costs of goods.

Ahmed wants credit to purchase sugar, salt, cooking oil, soap to sell in his shop.

loans.use: To buy sugar, salt, cooking oil, soap to sell

loans.name: Micaela

texts.es: Micaela, de 32 años, es una mujer, luchadora; como madre soltera, ella se dedicó al cuidado de sus 4 hijos menores. Con la ayuda de su hermana, los cuida y educa, en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la comunidad de Kivinaki (selva central peruana).Desde que era niña, Micaela trabajo en los campos de cultivo; los sembríos de frutos cítricos son su especialidad. Desde aquel entonces hasta hoy viene cultivando y cosechando las producciones de diferentes personas. Trabajar como “peón”, a ella no le atemoriza, por lo contrarío, le incentiva a progresar. Hace 10 años que viene trabajando en ese oficio y, ahora ella está planeando comprar un pequeño terreno agrícola, con ello podrá sembrar sus propios cultivos. Pero sabe que el camino es largo, dentro de muy poco dará el primer paso, comenzará con productos de fácil cultivo, para generar capital como es el caso del “plátano”. Micaela es responsable con los pagos a MFP, en cada acuerdo con su banco comunal, estimula a sus integrantes a ser trabajadores y puntuales. Ya es el tercer crédito que obtiene y está contenta por su progreso. Con el crédito que obtendrá, podrá completar el capital que necesita para comprar su propio terreno agrícola.
texts.en:
Micaela, age 32, is a tenacious woman.  As a single mother she devotes herself to taking care of her four minor children.  With help from her sister she takes care of them and is bringing them up in a rented house.  This house is in the Kivinaki (central Peruvian jungle) community.

Since she was a girl, Miacaela has worked in the fields.  Her specialty is growing citrus fruits.  From that time on she has been cultivating and harvesting other people’s productions.  Working as a “peon” (a hired field worker) does not scare her.  To the contrary, it motivates her to make progress.

She has been working this way for ten years.  She is now planning to buy a small piece of farming land, where she will be able to plant some of her own crops.  She knows that this path is long, and shortly she will take the first step.  She will start with crops that are easy to grow, as is the case with bananas, in order to generate capital.

Micaela is responsible with her payments to MFP.  Each agreement that her communal bank makes motivates the members to be hard-working and punctual.  This is her third loan, and she is happy with her progress.  She will use the loan to have enough money to buy her own farming land.

loans.use: To finish paying for agricultural land

loans.name: Idilfonso Aquilino

texts.es: Idilfonso Aquilino tiene 54 años, su actividad es una pulpería. Hace más de 10 años que tiene este negocio. Inicio porque él se dedicaba a la venta de ganado y agricultor, ya que su esposa le dio la idea a Idilfonso que establecieran este medio de vida en su hogar para ambos obtuvieran un medio de ingreso por lo que siempre se ha caracterizado por ofrecer un buen servicio el es un hombre muy trabajador. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de materia prima como golosinas, refrescos, pan, detergente y granos básicos.
texts.en:
Idilfonso Aquilina is 54 years old, and he has a small grocery store.  He has had this business for over ten years.  He used to sell livestock and farm, and then his wife gave Idilfonso the idea of establishing this way of earning a living in their home.  Both of them would have a way of getting income.  He is always known for providing good service, and he is a hard-working man.

The loan is to buy products like sweets, soft drinks, bread, detergent, and basic grains.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is a forty-four-year-old married man who has been a farmer for for twenty years. He owns a house in which he lives with his family of seven children. He moved from subsistence agriculture to agro-based commercial agriculture. However, his hardships include diseases, price fluctuations and high production costs.

Francis wants a loan to buy pesticides, fertilizer, manure and farm tools.

loans.use: To buy pesticides, fertilizers, manure and farm tools to increase production.

loans.name: Cesar Agusto

texts.es: Cesar Augusto tiene 30 años, el se dedica a la venta de bolsas plásticas. Desde hace mas 5 año, el es una persona muy responsable y disfruta de mucho de su trabajo y de interactuar con sus clientes. El se levanta temprano todos los días pues sabe que tiene que vender sus productos y recorrer mucho lugares, la necesidad de mantener a su familia es lo que lo ha motivado por esforzarse y seguir adelante. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de materia prima necesaria. Sueña con establecer su propio negocio.
texts.en: Cesar Augusto is thirty years old and has made a living selling plastic bags for five years.  He is a very responsible person who really enjoys his work and interacting with customers.  He gets up early everyday because he knows he has to sell his products and travel to many places.  The need to support his family motivates him to make the effort and to get ahead. The loan is to buy raw materials.  He dreams of establishing his own business.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Doña María, se dedica a la venta de Tortillas y ropa, tiene 51 años de edad, reside en la ciudad de San Miguel, departamento de San Miguel,  ella es madre soltera de una hija de 28 años de edad que es la que siempre la acompaña, su negocio lleva ya 10 años de existir, y dio comienzo por iniciativa propia ya que ella tenía que ver la forma de contar con ingresos para poder subsistir con su hija. 
Hoy día solicita un préstamo para la compa de maíz, gas y también ropa, este le ayudara a tener a disponibilidad lo necesario para realizar sus ventas, con la ropa pues debe estar actualizada con la ropa de moda, con estilos y colores nuevos.
Ella sueña con tener su negocio por largo tiempo, prosperar económicamente a través de este y satisfacer sus necesidades cotidianas.
texts.en: Doña María, 51, sells corn and tortillas for a living.  She lives in San Miguel, in the the department of San Miguel and is a single mother of a twenty-eight year old daughter, her constant companion.  She has had this business for ten years and got it started on her own since she had to find a way she could count on to support her and her daughter.  Today she is taking out a loan to buy corn, gas, and also clothing.  This will help her have what she needs to make her sales.  Regarding the clothes, well, they should be up-to-date and in style -- with the new styles and colors.  She dreams of having her business for a long time, prospering economically from it, and satisfying her daily needs.

loans.use: To purchase corn, gas, and clothing.

loans.name: Beatrice

texts.en: Beatrice is a 54-year-old widow who lives in a rented house in Kasese,Uganda and has five dependents. She has been in the business of selling second-hand clothing for thirty years. Her biggest challenge is competitors but despite the challenges, Beatrice says she plans to become a wholesaler in the future. Beatrice wants a loan to purchase second-hand clothes to sell during the Christmas season.

loans.use: Purchasing second-hand clothes to sell during the Christmas season.

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es: El Sr. Luis  se dedica a trabajar en el comercio de refrescos el cual lo compra de la fabrica de refrescos muy conocida de la ciudad y posteriormente lo lleva  a la localidad del chapare  y lo distribuye en tiendas de Quillacollo solicita el crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería ya que ahora ya tiene pedidos para lo cual necesita mas capital, vive con su madre quien se encarga de los quehaceres de la casa y el ayuda con los gastos del hogar, es una persona responsable y trabajadora que tiene muchas ganas de superación, uno de sus deseos es el de ser el mas grande distribuidor del sector.
texts.en:
Luis makes a living selling drinks. He buys from a well known factory in the city and takes them to Chapare region and distributes them in stores in Quillacollo. He is requesting a loan to buy more inventory since he has orders and needs capital to fill them.

He lives with his mother who takes care of household chores while he helps with expenses. He is a responsible and hardworking person with great aspirations. One of his dreams is to be the largest distributor in the business.

loans.use: Working capital for inventory

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en: Patrick is a forty-one-year-old married man who has three children living in the house that he owns in Fort Portal, Uganda. His family dream is to become a large-scale banana grower. He has been a driver and agriculturalist for the past five years. He also has a banana plantation that he started on family land but later purchased. Fluctuating prices are his major challenge, but he still hopes to be better in the future. Patrick needs a loan to buy chemicals to spray on his Irish potatoes to protect them from pests.

loans.use: To buy chemicals to protect his Irish potatoes against pests.

loans.name: Sonia Alejandrina

texts.es:
Sonia de 34 años, tiene una pequeña panadería. Vive con sus hijos en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores. 
  
Para darles una mejor vida a sus hijos ya que está separada de su esposo comenzó a comprar víveres y a hacer panes para tener un negocio en donde pueda vender panes y víveres. Poco a poco y con la motivación de sus hijos puedo tener su panadería surtida con víveres de primera necesidad. Trabaja con la ayuda de sus hijos mayores ya que ellos mientras atienden la panadería ella hace los panes.    

Para seguir con su negocio ella quiere comprar harina, bebidas, lácteos. En el futuro quiere implementa otra línea en su negocio ya que en sus tiempos libres vende productos de uso personal yendo casa por casa.
texts.en:
Sonia is 34 and has a small bakery. She lives with her children in an urban area called Orquideas [orchids]. It's called this because when it was discovered there were lots of flowers; currently there is a park with these flowers. Since she is separated from  her husband, and in order to provide a better life for her children, she began buying supplies and making bread to resell. 

Little by little and with her kids' support she was able to have a bakery and store selling primary needs goods. She works with her oldest children's help as they tend to  customers while she bakes. To keep going she needs to buy flour, beverages and dairy products. 

In the future she would like to add a product line to the business since she also sells personal care products door to door.

loans.use: Flour, yeast, beverages

loans.name: Reina Alicia

texts.es:
Reina, tiene un negocio de comida, tamales y pupuseria, reside en San Francisco Gotera, departamento de Morazán, tiene 41 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus dos hijas Tatiana de 10 años estudia 4°grado y Diana de 14 años de edad estudia 7° grado en la escuela. Reina tiene ya 8 años de dedicarse al negocio, tiene una prima que  le ayuda a atender a los clientes, también lo hacen sus hijas cuando salen de clases, su horario de atención es de 5:00am a 2:00pm, ella aprendió a cocinar por su madre que se lo enseño perfectamente, este tipo de negocio tiene una desventaja que los productos se dañan si no se consumen luego.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de productos como arroz, frijoles, carnes y bebidas para la preparación de los alimentos que a diario ofrece, este préstamo la ayudara a que en esta temporada de fiestas en el municipio mucha gente visita la feria y ella aprovechara para ofrece más comida.
Los sueños son tener un comedor amplio con capacidad para muchas personas, recibir muchas ganancias para solventar las necesidades del hogar y ayudar a sus hijas en los estudios para que puedan ser unas profesionales.
texts.en:
Reina has a food business selling tamales and “pupusas” (a thick corn tortilla stuffed with cheese, fried pork rind, chicken, or refried beans).  She lives in San Francisco Gotera in the Morazán department.  She is 41 years old, and she lives with her husband and their two daughters.  Tatiana, age 10, is in fourth grade.  Diana, age 14, is in seventh grade in school. 

Reina has had this business for eight years.  She has a cousin who helps her wait on customers.  Her daughters also help her when they are out of classes.  She tends her business from 5:00 a.m. until 2:00 p.m.  She learned to cook from who mother, who taught her perfectly.  This business has the disadvantage in that the products spoil if they are not consumed immediately.

She is currently requesting a loan to buy products like rice, beans, meat, and drinks in order to prepare that food that she sells daily.  This loan will help her in that during the season for parties in the municipality a lot of people go to the fair.  She will take advantage of this and offer more food.

Her dreams are to have an ample eatery with room for a lot of people.  Also, she wants to get a lot of earnings in order to cover the household necessities.  Additionally, she dreams of helping her daughters with their education so that they can become professionals.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, meat, and drinks

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor, de 29 años, es una mujer joven y con mucha vitalidad, junto a su esposo Ronald, de 28 años. Cuidan de su hija Evelin, de 7 años. Que es su razón de vivir, los tres viven en casa de su mamá, ubicada en la localidad de Casacoto. Su principal actividad es la agricultura, ya tiene 6 años de experiencia sembrando papa y arveja al por mayor y menor; afirma que en todas las cosechas agrícolas viaja a Lima donde la demanda es mayor y el precio de compra es beneficioso. Pero en temporadas bajas, vende su producción en el mercado central de su localidad. Según menciona, hace algunos años, decidió incursionar en la siembra de papa de la costa, en donde,  la poca información en el proceso de cuidado de las plantaciones en ese tipo de clima le produjo grandes perdidas, ahí tuvo que vender su camión, que le servía de trasporte. Ahora gracias al apoyo de su banco comunal; pudo salir adelante y junto a Ronald, están recuperando su estabilidad económica. Ahora ya adquirieron un camión, con que el que trabaja su esposo en el trasporte de mercadería por todo el país. Es el tercer crédito con MFP y, está  feliz de trabajar en su banco comunal, donde se reunieron personas de muy buenas y con grandes proyectos, de los cuales aprenderá mucho, afirma. Con el crédito que solicita, podrá adquirir abono para aplicar a su cultivo de arveja, que en el mes de diciembre, cosechará.
texts.en: Flor is 29 years old and is an energetic, young woman.  She is married to Ronald, 28, and they have a daughter Evelin, who is 7 years old and her reason for living.  They live in Flor's mother's house located in the town of Casacoto.  For the past 6 years she has been earning a living growing potatoes and peas to sell wholesale and retail.  She travels to Lima to sell her harvest because the demand there is higher and she earns a better profit.  During the off season, however, she sells her harvests in the central market in her town.  Some years ago, she decided to try planting potatoes from the coast but the lack of information on how to care for this variety in this climate led to large losses.  She had to sell her truck that served as her transportation.  Now, thanks to the help from her communal bank she has been able to get ahead, and together with Ronald, they are regaining their economic stability.  They now have a truck that her husband uses to transport their merchandise around the country.  This is her third loan with MFP.  She is happy to be working with her communal bank where she gets together with good people who are undertaking great projects from which she will learn a lot.  With the loan that she is requesting she will buy fertilizer to apply to her pea crop that she will harvest in December .

loans.use: To purchase sacks of fertilizer to apply to her pea crop that is already planted

loans.name: Marcia Del Socorro

texts.es: Marcia Del Socorro tiene 52 años, su actividad es la venta de comida y transporte. Hace más de 11 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que ha sido muy satisfactorio para ella obtener un medio de ingreso para mantener a sus 4 hijos. Inicio por medio de su Mama quien era que tenía a cargo el negocio, con el paso del tiempo le enseño a Marcia todo lo necesario para que ella aprendiera a administrar su actividad, todos los días se esfuerza por proporcionar el mejor servicio. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de granos básicos, aceite, verduras y leña.
texts.en:
Marcia Del Socorro, 52, sells food and provides transportation services.  She has had this business for over 11 years.  It has been a very satisfactory way for her to obtain a source of income to support her four children.

Her mother was the original owner of the business and as time went by she taught Marcia everything she needed to learn to run it.  Every day she makes the effort to provide better service.

The reason for the loan request is to buy basic grains, cooking oil, vegetables and firewood.

loans.use: To buy basic grains, cooking oil, vegetables and firewood.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es:
Martha se dedica a la fabricación de hamacas y matatas, tiene 35 años de edad, es viuda y madre de 6 hijos, trabaja por las mañanas en una clínica médica y por las tardes se dedica a tejer hamacas y matatas,  esta es la fuente de ingreso con la que cuenta para mantener a sus hijos.
Ella quiere compra materiales para tejer sus trabajos de encargo pero no cuenta con los fondos por lo que solicita un préstamo para adquirir hilos de seda, nailon de diferentes colores, sierres, agujas, que son los que más necesita para confeccionar las hamacas y matatas. Esta ayuda le será útil para incrementar la disponibilidad de productos a los clientes y mejorar sus ventas.
El sueño de ella es trabajar especialmente para que sus hijos se preparen con sus estudios y puedan tener mejores oportunidades en la vida.
texts.en:
Martha, 35, manufactures hammocks and matatas (type of woven, all-purpose bag).  She is a widow and has six children.  During the mornings she works at a health clinic and in the afternoon she makes hammocks.   This is the source of income she counts on to support her children.

She wants to buy supplies to weave the items she has pending orders for but she lacks funds to do so.  This is why she’s asking for a loan: to acquire silk and nylon thread in assorted colors, clasps and needles which are the things she needs the most to make the hammocks and matatas.  The help will be useful for her to increase availability of products for her customers thus improving her sales.

Her dream is to work especially so that her children can become educated and have better opportunities in life.

loans.use: To buy nylon and silk thread, clasps and needles.

loans.name: Sam

texts.en: Sam would like a loan to enable him buy lotion, hair, and shampoo for his beauty salon. He is a married man with four children. He lives in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is a civil servant and runs a beauty saloon. He dreams of educating his children up to university level and expanding his salon into a modern and bigger business.

loans.use: Buy lotion, hair, and shampoo for his beauty salon.

loans.name: Lucia

texts.es:
Lucia es una comerciante de Ropa, verduras y helados, tiene 36 años de edad, reside en el Cantón el Rosario de San Francisco Gotera, vive con su esposo don Walter y sus hijos Eugenia de 14 años de edad y Walter de 8 años de edad, ella vende helados en su casa y en el mercado de San Miguel vende ropa y verduras.
Lucia y su esposo está en proceso de hacerle mejoras a su vivienda es por lo cual solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción para hacer un muro a la orilla de su casa, esto le ayudara a tener en mejores condiciones su hogar y con más seguridad por cualquier problema que puedan tener estarán más seguros. 
Ella aspira una casa grande en buenas condiciones muy cómoda donde puedan desarrollarse sus hijos.
texts.en:
Lucia sells clothes, vegetables and ice-cream.  She is 36 years old and lives in Rosario de San Francisco Gotera canton with her husband, Walter, and their children, Eugenia, 14, and Walter, 8.  She sells ice-cream from home and sells clothes and vegetables in the San Miguel market.

Lucia and her husband are in the process of making some home improvements so they are asking for a loan to buy building materials and supplies to erect a wall along the perimeter of their house which will improve their home’s conditions and provide more security so that they will be more secure if any problem should arise.

She aspires to a larger, more comfortable house with better conditions where her children can grow up.

loans.use: To buy building materials and supplies to erect a wall.

loans.name: Fatou

texts.fr: Madame Fatou T. habite dans la localité de Bambilor. Elle est mariée et âgée de 49 ans. Elle s’active dans le commerce de lait frais et de lait caillé. Elle a une expérience de plus de 10 ans. Elle est membre du guichet de Bambilor depuis novembre 2009. Elle a déjà remboursé un prêt antérieur au sein de l’institution. Elle sollicite un crédit de 100000frs dans le but de développer son commerce de vente de lait. Ce financement pourra lui permettre d’améliorer  ses revenus , de renforcer sa capacité d’épargne et aussi de mieux prendre en charge les besoins  de sa famille en nourriture, et autres.
texts.en: Madam Fatou T. lives in the community of Bambilor. She is a 49-year-old married woman. She works in the fresh and curdled milk business where she has over 10 years of experience. She has been a member of the Bambilor microloan association since November 2009 and she already paid back a previous loan within the association. She is seeking a loan of 100 000F in order to develop her business which consists of selling milk. This funding will allow her to improve her income, to strengthen her ability to save money, and to take better care of her family’s food and other needs.

loans.use: For additional funding

loans.name: Cecilia Monica

texts.es:
Cecilia de 31 años, tiene una pequeña papelería muy variada con juguetes y ropa. Vive con su esposo e hijos en una zona urbana llamada Orquídeas porque en su descubrimiento descubrieron muchas flores y en la actualidad hay un parque de estas flores. 

Comenzó con un pequeño capital que su cuñada le presto para tener su propio negocio. Compro cuadernos, plumas, papelería y los comenzó a vender en un local. Trabaja desde las 07h00am hasta las 22h00pm en su papelería. Vende los juguetes a $ 5.00, zapatos a $ 3.00, cuadernos a $ 1.00 c/u. Ella tiene muchas aspiraciones con su negocio porque quiere darles una buena vida a sus hijos que aun están pequeños. 

 Con el préstamo quiere comprar juguetes y artículos para la temporada de navidad. En el futuro quiere tener otra papelería en un lugar bien transitado.
texts.en:
Cecilia, 31, has a small, varied stationery shop where she also stocks toys and clothes.  She lives with her husband and children in an urban zone, called Orquídeas, because when it was discovered there were lots of flowers there and currently there is a park with these flowers.

She started with a small amount of capital that her sister-in-law lent her so that she could have her own business.  She bought notebooks, pens and paper goods and started to sell in a locale.  She is open from 7am until 10pm.  She sells the toys for $5.00, the shoes for $3.00 and notebooks for $1.00 a piece.  She has a lot of hopes for her store because she wants to provide her children, who are still little, with a good life.

She will use the loan to buy toys and Christmas items.  In the future she’d like to have a stationery shop in a well traveled area.

loans.use: For toys and shoes.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: Juan, de 58 años, en compañía de su esposa Isabel, de 56 años; cuidan de sus 6 hijos, de los cuales solo viven con 2 de ellos; Julio, de 17 y Obed, de 14 años. Todos unidos viven en la comunidad de Casacoto. Todas las mañanas Juan organiza las diferentes actividades de casa, mientras que Isabel, tiene que atender a sus pobladores, que va a su pequeño establecimientos y que a primeras horas del día le compran leña. En tanto Juan sale a cuidar de sus animales entre ovinos y vacunos; ya después del almuerzo, se dirige a sus terrenos agrícolas, que con tanto esfuerzo pudo adquirir, ahí siembra papa y arveja. Luego de la cosecha de arveja, son comercializados en el mercado central de su localidad y en épocas de campaña de papa, los negociantes le brindan un buen precio de compra. Por ello él, está pensando adquirir más terrenos de cultivo, donde no solo sembrará papa, sino también demás productos que crecen en está zona. Es el tercer crédito con MFP y está  feliz de trabajar con los pobladores de su localidad, donde tomaron la decisión de invertir y progresar juntos. Con el crédito que solicita; podrá adquirir 18 sacos de abono, para su producción de papa de la variedad “canchan”, que muy pronto cosechará.
texts.en:
Juan, 58, with his wife, Isabel, 56, watch over their 6 children, just two of whom still live with them: Julio, 17 and Obed, 14.  They all live together in Casacoto.  

Every morning Juan organizes the various household chores while Isabel has to take care of neighbors who come to her small establishment to buy firewood very early in the morning.  Meanwhile, Juan goes out to take care of his cattle and sheep and after lunch goes out to tend to his fields, which he acquired through much effort, where he grows potatoes and peas.  When the peas are harvested they are sold at his community’s central market and during potato season he gets good prices for them from merchants.Because of this he is planning to acquire more fields where he won’t just grow potatoes but also some of the other products that grow in this zone.

This is his 3rd loan with MFP and he is happy to work with residents of his locality who decided to invest and progress together.

He will use the requested loan to buy 18 sacks of manure for his “Canchan” variety of potatoes that he will harvest very soon

loans.use: To buy 18 sacks of manure.

loans.name: David

texts.en: David is a 25-year-old man. He is married with one child and lives in his mud and wattle house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His family dream is to buy a piece of land and construct a permanent reasonable house. David owns a retail shop, which he has been operating for the last three years, he says! But he started as a hawker to get him to where he is now. He has the big challenge of limited capital but still hopes for the best to become a wholesaler in the future. David is also a farmer and mainly deals in onions. David intends to use the loan to help him pay for labor for weeding his onion farm.

loans.use: To pay for labor for weeding his onion farm.

loans.name: Aracelis Del Socorro

texts.es: Aracelis Del Socorro tiene 26 años, su actividad es la venta de mercadería. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio. Este negocio se lo enseñaron sus padres la comercialización de artesanía es un negocio al que se dedican las personas de pocos recursos en la comarca de tololapa. Está ubicado en su casa de habitación en donde muchos de sus vecinos compran sus diferentes productos y también ella los vende de manera ambulante. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de materia prima necesaria y vender la artesanía ya que se acerca una muy buena temporada. Sueña con ampliar su negocio y vender a otros departamentos.
texts.en: Aracelis Del Socorro is 26 years old and her business activity is selling merchandise.  She has had her business for more than 4 years.  Her parents taught her the business.  Selling handicrafts is a common business activity amongst people with few means of support in the district of Tololapa.  Aracelis' business is located in her home where many neighbors come to buy her different products.  She also sells her products itinerantly.  She is requesting this loan to buy necessary raw materials and sell her handicrafts since a very good season is approaching.  She dreams of expanding her business and selling in other departments.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is a 48-year-old married man with six children living together in his own semi-permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. He deals in growing sugarcane, tomatoes, and eggplants. His family and business dream is to become a big commercial sugarcane grower. Richard needs the loan to help him spray his tomatoes and eggplants in order to harvest good results.

loans.use: To spray his tomatoes and eggplants in order to harvest good results.

loans.name: Jesus

texts.es: Jesús, de 25 años, es un hombre joven y con muchas aspiraciones. Junto a Cesi, de 21 años, cuidan de su hija, Maribel de 1 año de nacida. Los tres como una gran familia viven juntos, en casa de sus padres, ubicada en la localidad de Casacoto. A pesar de las nuevas responsabilidades, que tiene, él no se amilana, ya tiene 6 años dedicándose a la agricultura, por ello; “no es algo nuevo para mí”, afirma. Y tiene mucha razón, ya que Jesús, es respetado en su localidad; ahí sus cultivos de papa, en grandes extensiones, son los más cotizados en el mercado central de su ciudad. Lo que más le gusta a él, es poder ayudar a los padres de Cesi, todos los días junto a ellos, se encamina a cuidar de sus sembríos, los cuida y aplica abono con mucho cuidado. Pero como ya tiene familia; ahora el quiere sacarlos adelante y brindarles una mejor calidad de vida; por ello esta juntando dinero para abrir una pequeña tienda de comestibles, donde está seguro podrá tener mayor ingresos.Es el primer crédito con MFP y está  feliz de trabajar en su banco comunal, que es muy respetado en la zona; en donde augura muchos éxitos. Con el crédito que solicita, podrá obtener varios sacos de abono, para poder nivelar su producción de papa, que en este mes cosechará.
texts.en:
Jesús is 25 years old.  He is a young man with many aspirations.  Together with 21 year-old Cesi, he looks after his daughter Maribel who is 1 year old.  The three of them live together in her parents' home which is located in the town of Casacoto.

In spite of the new responsibilities which he has, he is not discouraged because he has been farming for 6 years. “It isn't new for me” he confirms.  And he is indeed very right since Jesús is respected in his town.  His potato crops are the most sought after in his town's central market.  What he most likes is being able to help Cesi's parents.  Every day, alongside them, he goes off to looks after his crops.  He tends to them and applies fertilizer very carefully.  However, as he now has a family he would like to help them get ahead and provide them with a better quality of life.  For this reason, he is gathering together money to open a small grocery store from which he is certain that he will be able to make better profits.

This is Jesús' first loan from MFP and he is happy to be working with his community bank which is very respected in the district.  As a member of the bank, he predicts a lot of success.  He will use the loan he is requesting to obtain several sacks of fertilizer for his potato crop which he will harvest this month.

loans.use: To buy sacks of fertilizer for his potato crop

loans.name: Rolando Jose

texts.es: Rolando José, está casado y vive con sus 2 hijos. El quiere invertir en la compra de productos lácteos. Además, en su finca produce este tipo de productos y es buena producción. Tiene varios años que se dedica a su negocio desde hace 8 años, quiere crecer como un productor de la zona. Es el primer préstamo que recibe, ya que lo hace con fin de mejorar su negocio. El tiene como meta llegar a generar ganancias para su bienestar propio y de su mujer en el futuro y seguir creciendo en el negocio de la producción de leche y también crecer como persona.
texts.en: Rolando José is married and lives with his 2 children.  He would like to invest in buying dairy products.  He also produces this type of product on his property and it is a good production.  He has been in this business for 8 years.  He would like to grow as an area producer.  This is his first loan and he is taking the loan to improve his business.  His goal is to make profits for his own well-being and that of his wife.  In the future he would like to continue growing in his milk production business and also continue growing as a person.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en: Christopher is a 26-year-old male. He is married with three children and lives in Kasese, Uganda. He operates a motorcycle for transport business. However, he has the challenge of his motorcycle breaking down due to poor roads. He started riding other people’s motorcycles but later acquired his own and expects by 2013 to have at least three motorcycles of his own. Christopher intends to use the loan proceeds to buy a motorcycle for transport business.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.name: David

texts.en: David would like a loan to buy tires and pay for the general service of his vehicle for his transport business.  He is a married man with three children. He lives in Kyenjojo, Uganda. He is into the transport business. He dreams of educating his children so that they can have a better future and buying a coaster for his transport business.

loans.use: To buy tires and general service of his vehicle

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana, de 37 años, una mujer fuerte y valerosa, que en compañía de su esposo Erasmo, de 38 de años, cuidan de sus hijos: Johan, de 15 y Kevin, de 13 años. Ellos son una familia unida y con aspiraciones, que viven en la zona rural de Casacoto. Ella menciona que la mejor herencia que dejará a sus hijos, es el estudio; por eso está trabajando muy duro para poder pagar los estudios universitarios de sus dos hijos adolescentes. A pesar de su edad, Juana afirma que son muy responsables y que la ayudan en el cuidado de sus cultivos, ya tiene 15 años dedicándose a ello y como buena agricultora, la mayor parte del día la pasa en sus cultivos de papa y hortalizas; los que en cada cosecha, según cuenta, le brindan buenas utilidades, ya que viaja al mercado central de la capital, donde comercializa sus productos al por mayor; sin embargo en tiempos de escasa producción, los vendedores minoristas de su ciudad compran sus cultivos a menor precio. Pero a pesar de lo inestable del mercado, su esposo Erasmo tiene una pequeña tienda de comestibles; donde Juana está planeando surtirlo, de esa manera tener más utilidades. Es el tercer crédito con MFP y agradece el apoyo de los integrantes de su banco comunal, donde augura muchos éxitos, ya que son buenos y honestos. Con los tres mil  nuevos soles que solicita, comprará 80 sacos de abono, y si el dinero le alcanza, ya que cada saco cuenta un promedio de S/. 120.00 nuevos soles; podrá invertir en el pago del salario a los peones, que le ayudarán en el campo.
texts.en:
Juana, 37, is a strong and brave woman who, together with her husband, Erasmo, 38, cares for their children Johan, 15 and Kevin, 13.  They are a united family with hope for the future; they live in rural Casacoto.

She mentions that the best inheritance she can leave her children is a good education and this is why she works so hard to pay for the college education of her two adolescent sons.  Despite their ages, Juana affirms that they are very responsible and help her care for her crops.  She has been in this business for 15 years now and, as any good farmer, she spends most of the day on her potato and vegetable crops which provide good profits at each harvest because she goes to the central market in the capital to sell at wholesale.

However, during times of scarce production, retailers in her city buy her crops at lower prices.  But, despite the instability in the market, her husband, Erasmo, has a small grocery store that Juana plans to stock so that they will have more profits.

This is her 3rd loan with MFP and she is grateful for the support from her fellow communal bank members where she expects much success because they are good and honest.

She will use the requested 3000 new soles to buy 80 sacks of manure and if there is money left over to be able to pay salaries to laborers that will help her in the fields.

loans.use: To buy 80 sacks of manure and pay labor costs for workers to help with the field work.

loans.name: Norma Del Carmen

texts.es: Norma Del Carmen tiene 45 años, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos. Hace más de 13 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que con mucho empeño ha demostrado que no es fácil salir adelante, tiene 2 hijos a su cargo que están menores de edad y asisten a escuela pública ya que Norma no puede brindarles una educación superior. El objetivo de su negocio es brindar un buena atención y al mismo tiempo ofrecerle a los clientes muy buenos productos. Para norma se acerca una buena temporada navideña, es por eso que solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima como pintura de labios, polvos, sombras, pintura de uñas, tratamientos y perfumes.
texts.en:
Norma Del Carmen, 45, has sold cosmetics for over 13 years.  Through much effort she has shown that it isn’t easy to get ahead.  She has two minor children in her care who go to public school because Norma can’t afford better education.

The objective of her business is to provide good customer service while offering her customers very good products.  The Christmas season is approaching and this is a good time for Norma.  This is why she’s asking for funds in order to buy raw materials like: lipsticks, powders, eye shadow, nail polish, skin treatments and perfumes.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Perveen's Group

texts.en:
Perveen is married to M., who is a government employee on a meager income. He also runs a grocery store part-time in the market, from where he sells daily use items like cooking oils, spices, sugar and tea to his customers. Perveen is also a government employee, and runs her household very well.

She lives with her family in Khanewal, Pakistan. She has lived in a two-room brick house in an area named Christian colony for over 26 years. She has a son and daughter. Her son left school after 10th grade and started a job. Her daughter is in 9th grade. 

She has applied for a loan from Kiva's partner, Asasah, for her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy groceries in bulk to sell in his store. He has had this business for the past four years. Perveen is hopeful that an investment will bring better profits for her husband and her family will be able to enjoy a better life. 

She is a regular borrower of Asasah--this is her fourth loan application. In previous years, she has maintained a good credit record and attended every meeting.

loans.use: To buy groceries for grocery store business

loans.name: Scarlette Isachara

texts.es: Scarlette Isachara tiene 22 años, esta joven emprendedora tiene su actividad como es un cafetín. Hace más de 3 años que tiene este negocio, por lo que no ha sido fácil mantenerlo los mayores desafíos que enfrenta son la difícil situación económica, por lo que no puede ofrecer una gran variedad de productos. La mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan café, agua, golosinas, hamburguesa, sándwich entre otras cosas. ella solicita este crédito para la compra de materia prima necesaria en su cafetín ya que se acerca la temporada navideña y fin de año.
texts.en: Scarlette Isachara is 22 years old, and this young entrepreneur is the owner of a cafe.  She's owned this business for about three years, but it has been a challenge  keeping it going.  The biggest difficulties she faces are economic.  Because of this, she has been unable to offer a wide variety of products.  Most of her customers order coffee, juice, candy, hamburgers, sandwiches, and other things.  She is requesting this loan so she can buy supplies for the cafe, in order to be ready for the Christmas season and the coming New Year.

loans.use: Business capital

loans.name: Elias

texts.es: Elías, de 54 años, es un hombre responsable y trabajador. Como padre soltero, cuida de sus 3 hijos; a los que cuida y educa en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad nativa de Centro Huachirik. Hace tan solo 38 años, que viene dedicándose a la agricultura. Su mayor producción se centra en el café, donde obtiene grandes utilidades; ya que la calidad de sus cultivos son reconocidos en la asociación a la que pertenece, donde sus miembros pueden exportar sus granos al extranjero. Ahora desea incrementar al máximo, la calidad de sus cultivos, ya que; lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es ser reconocido por su eficiencia en la agricultura. Pero como buen trabajador del campo; desea incursionar en la siembra de plátanos, para ello está juntando dinero, para poder comprar mamones (plantas pequeñas de plátano) y así comenzar con el cuidado de los mismos. Es el primer crédito con MFP y, se siente orgulloso de pertenecer a un banco comunal, donde sus integrantes son responsables y muy cumplidos. Con el crédito que solicita, podrá comprar abono orgánico y 10 sacos de fertilizante natural (guano de ave), con ello podrá fortalecer sus sembríos de café de la variedad “delimita” y “cupacha”.
texts.en:
Elías, 54, is a responsible, hard working man.  He is a single father caring for three children.   He cares for them and educates them in their own house located in an indigenous community called Centro Huachirik.

He has been a farmer for 38 years.  His main crop is coffee which produces large profits because the quality of his product is appreciated by the association he belongs to whose members export the grains abroad.

He wants to increase the quality of his crops to the maximum degree since what he likes best about his work is to be recognized for his farming efficiency.  As a good field worker he wants to go into banana growing and is saving up to buy small banana plants to start caring for them.

This is his first loan with MFP and he feels proud to be part of a communal bank where the members are responsible and committed.

He will use the requested loan to buy organic manure and 10 sacks of natural fertilizer (bird guano) with which to strengthen his crops of “Delimita” and “Cupacha” varieties of coffee.

loans.use: To buy organic manure and 10 sacks of fertilizer for his coffee crops.

loans.name: Rafael

texts.es: El Sr.  Rafael   se dedica a trabajar por las mañanas en una institución publica después por las noches trabaja como chofer con movilidad propia, esta casado y su esposa se dedica  al tejido de mantas, actividad donde le va muy bien, ambos compraron la movilidad con sus ahorros pero ahora esta presentando algunas fallas razón por la cual esta solicitando el crédito para la refacción y compra de llantas nuevas para la movilidad, es  una persona responsable y trabajadora que tiene muchas ganas de superación, se esfuerza mucho dedicándose a estas dos actividades pero sabe que su esfuerzo será recompensado, esta muy agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado
texts.en:
Rafael works mornings for a public institution and at night he drives his own taxi.  He is married and his wife weaves blankets, an activity in which she does well.  Together they used their savings to buy the vehicle.  However, it is starting to have some mechanical problems and this is why he’s asking for a loan: to make repairs and to buy new tires for the vehicle.

He is a responsible, hard working person who very much wants to get ahead in life.  He puts in a lot of effort to both activities knowing that effort will be rewarded.  He is very grateful to the institution for the help provided.

loans.use: For vehicle repair and to buy tires.

loans.name: Julia Beatriz

texts.es:
la sra. Julia Beatriz C. O. se dedica al comercio, tiene una pulperia en la comunidad de Trojes, Julia es nativa de Oropoli y en busca de fuentes de trabajo para mejorar su situacion economica es como ella y su esposo llegan a Las Trojes, caracterizada por ser una zona apta para la ganaderia, caficultura y agricultura siendo estos los rubros que les generan ingresos a muchas familias que viven en ese lugar.

Su esposo se dedica a la ganaderia pues tiene una pequeña finca de café y ganado que con mucho esfuerzo y fe han logrado sacar adelante.
sus hijos todos son profesionales. 
el credito lo invertira en la compra de mercaderia y asi surtir mas su negocio de tal manera que sus clientes se sientan satisfechos y asi mejorar sus ventas y de hecho obtener mas ganancias.
texts.en:
Julia Beatriz C. O. works in retail trade. She has a neighborhood store in the community of Trojes. Julia is a native of Oropoli, and it was in search of sources of work in order to improve their economic situation that she and her husband came to Las Trojes. The area is characterized by its suitability for ranching, coffee growing and agriculture, and these are the professions that generate income for many families living in this place. 

Her husband works in ranching, since he has a small farm with livestock and coffee trees, which he has been able to advance with great effort and faith. Her children are all professionals. 

She will invest the loan in buying merchandise in order to stock her store more effectively, so that her customers feel satisfied, and thus she will improve her sales and obtain greater profits.

loans.use: Buying soft drinks

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es: Aurelia, de 39 años, está casada con Guzmán, de 38 años, ambos tienen 3 hijos menores. A los que cuidan y educan en su casa propia ubicada en la zona rural de Yaroka. Tiene 17 años dedicándose a la agricultura, “el campo le da todo”, afirma, es por ello que Aurelia desea con muchas ganas seguir trabajando como lo está haciendo hasta hoy. Gracias a Dios, sus sembríos de arveja, papa, gladiolo, maíz y zanahoria, le dan mucha rentabilidad. En época de cosecha su producción es comercializada, en la ciudad de Tarma y Lima, por eso viaja constantemente; pero gracias al apoyo de Guzmán, su familia tiene más ingresos, hasta hace algunos años adquirió un par de carros, con los que realiza trasporte público, en las rutas de Tarma – Palca; la lejanía de los pueblos, le proporcionan a esté oficio una gran rentabilidad. En adelante desea comprar más autos y de esa manera abarcar más poblados lejanos. Es el tercer crédito con MFP y se muestra feliz de trabajar en su banco comunal, ya que le agrada compartir, ideas, experiencias de éxito junto a su banco comunal. Con el crédito que solicita, podrá adquirir semillas de gladiolos y lechuga, ya que en los próximos meses está planeando sembrar y si el dinero le alcanza, también comprará algunos sacos de abono.
texts.en: Aurelia, 39 years old, is married to Guzmán, 38 years old. They have 3 young children together. They care and educate them in their home in the rural area of Taroka. They have been devoted to agriculture for 17 years. They affirm "the fields give us everything". It is for this that Aurelia hopes to continue working as she has done until now. Thanks to God, her harvests of peas, potatoes, gladiolo, corn and carrots give them lots of profit. At harvest time, her production is sold in the cities of Tarma and Lima and for this, she travels constantly. Thanks to the support of Guzmán, her family has more income and bought two cars with which they run public transport between Tarma and Palca. The distance provides a very profitable job. Going forward, they hope to purchase more cars and in this way, cover more communities. This is her third loan with MFP and is happy to work in her communal bank as she loves to share ideas and success stories with her communal bank. With the loan she is requesting, she can buy seeds for gladiolos and lettuce, so that in the coming months she will plant the crops and if the money covers it, also buy some sacks of fertilizer.

loans.use: Buy seeds for lettuce and would like to buy sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Nury Elena

texts.es:
Nury Elena F. es una mujer de 41 años que vive en la ciudad de Bogotá, la capital de Colombia, con sus 2 hijos en las edades de 18 y 20 años; ella tiene un restaurante de comida china,   negocio que inició cuando  trabajando  durante mas de 10 años en restaurantes, incluyendo restaurantes chinos, aprendió a preparar comidas,  de ahí nació la idea de crear su propio negocio enfocándose en  comida oriental, así nació el Restaurante Mr.  Shing Express, con el cual lleva  3 años preparando  recetas como arroz chino, cerdo agridulce, arroz de camarones, arroz y pasta con pollo, lumias, y muchas delicias de la cocina oriental, que en la actualidad  registra los siguientes índices financieros: Margen de Utilidad 39.1%,  endeudamiento total 12,59%, autonomía 87.41%, endeudamiento con su nuevo crédito es de un 41,67%, la rotación de Inventarios es  de 5 días y la  rentabilidad sobre  las ventas 16.04%.
